properties.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo; Inland Willacy; Brooks; Northern Hidalgo; Jim Hogg
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 8 at 7:11AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
An expanding pocket of fog extended from west Harlingen to
Weslaco...northwest through Elsa/Edcouch and San Manuel and
northward through Falfurrias and Hebbronville at 7 AM. Visibility
had fallen to one quarter to one half mile. Additional expansion
is possible through 8 AM and could include Edinburg...north
McAllen...and Raymondville.

The fog should burn off between 830 and 9 AM as southeast winds
begin to increase.

Motorists along Interstate 2...Business 83...Interstate 69C...Farm
to Market 88...and surrounding streets and roads should slow
down...use low beam headlights...and leave a safe distance between
vehicles.

NWSheadline: Areas of Dense Fog Continue Across the Mid Valley through the Northern Ranchlands
